Instructions: 1. Search 'Web SO' or 'SO' in Unity. 2. Review 'Order Header Alerts' for status flags. 3. If 'Report in Process - Not yet a Good Party' appears, wait for background checks. 4. Note: OMT cannot expedite these releases.
1. Use the main search bar for Case Numbers. 2. Look for 'SFDC' prefixes indicating recipient responses. 3. Check for linked cases from Customer Support or OMT using the Order Number confirmation.
1. Check Order Line in IMS. 2. If 'Awaiting Receipt' and within Lead Time, advise customer of current ETA. 3. Do not escalate if order is within the quoted window.

1. Use 'Vertical Supplier Partner Information' to find contact. 2. Create Salesforce Case. 3. Email vendor using standard inquiry template. 4. DO NOT include the customer on vendor emails. 5. Follow up every 48-72 hours.
1. Access the 'Digital Customer' tab. 2. Navigate to 'Digital Customer Maintenance'. 3. Verify user roles and permissions align with Unity/Salesforce site mapping.
1. Verify order payment was via Wire/Proforma. 2. Confirm funds were received in Unity. 3. Initiate Refund Case in SFDC. 4. Route to Finance/Collector for bank detail verification.
1. Identify duplicate accounts in Digital Customer tab. 2. Select 'Master' profile. 3. Deactivate old/incorrect login. 4. Resend portal invitation to the correct email address.
1. Identify facility ECCDVXXX (Venlo). 2. Check for 'Awaiting Export' status. 3. Verify if tracking is visible on carrier site but missing in IMS. 4. Update Case with manual tracking if found.
